channel.title: shell on rx-78-kum0

item.title: nyan
item.description: #!/usr/bin/env bash # Print nyan cat # https://github.com/steckel/Git-Nyan-Graph/blob/master/nyan.sh # If you want big animated version: `telnet miku.acm.uiuc.edu` e='\033' RESET="$e[0m" BOLD="$e[1m" CYAN="$e[0;96m" RED="$e[0;91m" YELLOW="$e[0;93m" GREEN="$e[0;92m" echo if [ $[$RANDOM%2] -eq "0" ]; then echo -en $RED'`·.,¸,.·*·.' echo -e $RESET$BOLD'╭━━━━╮'$RESET echo -en $YELLOW'`·.,¸,.·*·.' echo -e $RESET$BOLD'|::: /\_/\\'$RESET echo -en $GREEN'`·.,¸,.·*·.' echo -e $RESET$BOLD'|:::( ◕ᴥ◕)'$RESET echo -en $CYAN'`·.,¸,.·*·.' echo -e $RESET$BOLD'u-u━━-u--u'$RESET else echo -en $RED'-_-_-_-_-_-_-_' echo -e $RESET$BOLD',------,'$RESET echo -en $YELLOW'_-_-_-_-_-_-_-' echo -e $RESET$BOLD'| /\_/\\'$RESET echo -en $GREEN'-_-_-_-_-_-_-' echo -e $RESET$BOLD'~|__( ^ .
